original_text: Every believer must take care of his own family. Certainly, he must do that for the people who live with him in his home. If anyone does not do that, it shows that he has refused God's true message. That person is worse than someone who does not believe in Christ.
korean_text: 누구든지 자기 친족 특히 자기 가족을 돌보지 아니하면 믿음을 배반한 자요 불신자보다 더 악한 자니라

sentences.original_text: Every believer must take care of his own family.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 믿는 자는 자기 가족을 돌보아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: for the people who live with him in his home.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 집에서 함께 사는 사람들을 위해.

sentences.original_text: If anyone does not do that,
it shows that he has refused God's true message.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 하나님의 참된 말씀을 거절했다는 것을 보여줍니다.

sentences.original_text: That person is worse than someone
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 어떤 사람보다 더 나쁩니다.

sentences.original_text: who does not believe in Christ.
